record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term=NULL and format.name="file.prompt.dbu" and syslanguage="en"
record.format.name: file.prompt.dbu

brief.brief: Use this form to specify unload options, including the name of the external file to unload to.

detail.detail: External File Name: Specify the name of external file into which to unload the records.
Member: Specify the member name of the external file if the external file is a partitioned dataset, otherwise, leave blank.
Unload Type: Specify binary, text, or export (default is binary) depending on whether you want to unload the records in binary, text, or raw (export) format.
Append or Create: Select Append to add the unload to the end of an existing external file. Select Create to overwrite the existing file.
To export records, you must allocate the proper record length.
